source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery video presents static shots of the magnificent Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute in Venice. The grand, domed building is captured from different angles under a bright, clear sky, highlighting its ornate Baroque architecture. There is no significant subject motion in these picturesque views.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This scenery video presents shots of the magnificent Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute in Venice. The grand, domed building is captured from different angles under a bright, clear sky, highlighting its ornate Baroque architecture. There is no significant subject motion in these picturesque views, although figures at the bottom of the frame exhibit some movement.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery video presents shots of the magnificent Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute in Venice. The grand, domed building is captured from different angles under a bright, clear sky, highlighting its ornate Baroque architecture. There is no significant subject motion in these picturesque views, although figures at the bottom of the frame exhibit some movement.

generated_critique: The caption correctly identifies the Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute as the central subject but fails to adequately describe the motion present in the video. The statement that there is "no significant subject motion" is inaccurate, as the video clearly shows gondolas and vaporettos moving across the water in the foreground, creating ripples that reflect the sunlight. The description of the people as "figures at the bottom of the frame exhibit some movement" is too vague; a more accurate caption would specify that small groups of tourists are walking up and down the basilica's main steps. Furthermore, the caption omits any description of the camera's own movement. The video begins with a slow pan from left to right across the Grand Canal before the camera gently tilts upward to follow the building's facade to its central dome. The use of subjective words like "magnificent" and "grand" should also be replaced with a more objective description of the visual sequence and the specific movements within the scene.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video showcases the Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute in Venice, featuring dynamic elements and camera movements. The video opens with a slow pan from left to right across the Grand Canal, capturing gondolas and vaporettos moving across the water, their ripples reflecting the sunlight. The camera then gently tilts upward to follow the basilica's ornate Baroque facade up to its central dome. In the foreground, small groups of tourists can be seen walking up and down the basilica's main steps, adding a lively touch to the scene.
